From: "Daniel Paul Hightower" <dph_of_rules@...>

Shoo, thanks for posting the link, Tevildo.  I have problem detecting 
online sacarism.

Hmm.  If I remind people why they need to go through Tevildo's 
scenarios first, you might accuse of something else.  If I do not 
remind people, well, nothing happens because there is a built in 
reminder when people download my scenarios.  I, also, think Tevildo 
best indirectly explained why they should go through his scenarios 
first.

BTW, soldiers, archers, druids, elves, fire elementals, barbarians, 
orcs, orc captains, clerics, and possibly mage-oriented scenarios are 
on my list.  What kind of maps do people think would be the best for 
each character?

Yep, I have finished my first new scenario this year.  The next one 
will take a long time to build because it centers around the theme of 
'the weakest link in a chain determines the strength of the entire 
chain'.
